column5: With Simcoe getting colder and closer to being fishable I started thinking, what happened to the bait shop that was torn down when they turned the rest stop on the 400 south of King road into an ON go? I used to love picking up minnows and a few other random supplies from there before heading out for a day of perchin'.
I couldn't find it,but they say it's near BPS/Rutherford rd.
It's in Vaughn mills, but the strip mall part, on the north side. Good prices on everything I've seen

Called True Canadian Outdoors. Owned by a former employee of the shop on the 400. Just off Rutherford Rd. 1st lights east of the 400. Head south at the light and make the 1st left and than look to the right near the corner of the building.
Why not just get bait in Lefroy?
Never done it before although that is a good point. Thanks guys.
